title: Get the TikTok Shop exclusive authorization status of an ad account

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: store_id
parameters.description: The ID of the TikTok Shop. To obtain a TikTok Shop that is available for GMV Max Campaigns, use /gmv_max/store/list/ and confirm that the returned is_gmv_max_available is true .

parameters.name: store_authorized_bc_id
parameters.description: ID of the Business Center that is authorized to access the TikTok Shop ( store_id ).

parameters.name: advertiser_id
parameters.description: ID of the ad account that you want to check the GMV Max exclusive authorization status for.

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix-Return Code .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

fields.name: store_id
fields.description: The ID of the TikTok Shop.

fields.name: advertiser_id
fields.description: The ID of the ad account.

fields.name: authorization_status
fields.description: The status of exclusive authorization for the ad account to create GMV Max ads for the TikTok Shop. Enum values: EFFECTIVE : The ad account is currently granted exclusive GMV Max authorization. INEFFECTIVE : The ad account was granted exclusive GMV Max authorization but the authorization has been cancelled. UNAUTHORIZED : The ad account has never been granted GMV Max exclusive authorization.

fields.name: advertiser_name
fields.description: The name of the ad account. Note : When authorization_status is UNAUTHORIZED , this field is not returned.

fields.name: advertiser_status
fields.description: The status of the ad account. Enum values: STATUS_ENABLE : Approved. STATUS_CONFIRM_FAIL : Not approved. STATUS_PENDING_CONFIRM : In review. STATUS_LIMIT : Suspended. STATUS_CONTRACT_PENDING : Contract has not taken effect. STATUS_DISABLE : Disabled. STATUS_PENDING_CONFIRM_MODIFY : Modifications pending review. STATUS_PENDING_VERIFIED : Pending verification. STATUS_SELF_SERVICE_UNAUDITED : Pending verification of qualifications for the self-service account. STATUS_WAIT_FOR_BPM_AUDIT : Pending CRM system review. STATUS_CONFIRM_FAIL_END : CRM system review failed. STATUS_CONFIRM_MODIFY_FAIL : Review of modifications failed. Note : When authorization_status is UNAUTHORIZED , this field is not returned.

fields.name: identity_id
fields.description: Returned only when an official TikTok account is set for the TikTok Shop. The ID of the identity associated with the official TikTok account for the TikTok Shop.
